_source.short_desc: Straightforward asset, maintenance & work order management software. Great software doesn't take hours of training & set-up.
_source.long_desc:
Straightforward work order software with features such as asset tracking, inventory, reporting and beautiful, industry-leading native mobile apps.
The leading disruptor in the work order software industry, Fixd is the software to turn to when old, legacy software just can't go with you into the future.
_source.pricing_details:
Maintainly offers a free plan with limited features, after which pricing scales depending on business size, as follows (all prices in USD):

Free: includes mobile app, materials database, and flexible asset hierarchies. 
Small Business: $12/user/month for all free features plus timesheet integration, email and push notifications, stocktaking, and inventory management.
Enterprise: $24/user/month for all the Small Business plan features plus multi-business and multi-site management, bulk work order creation, API access, and a dedicated account manager.

Additional features: 
Inventory management: $6/user/month
Timesheets management: $4/user/month
Payroll tracking: $2/user/month

Special pricing is available for developing markets & the Maintainly Social Impact Fund is open to all not-for-profit entities, or for-profit companies making a social impact that aligns with Maintainly's core values.
_source.target_audience: Industries with assets under management & work orders. This includes energy, healthcare (eg. hospitals), farming / agriculture, manufacturing, hotel, vacation rental, gym & church.

related_products.short_desc: UpKeep is rated the #1 mobile-first Work Order Management Software to streamline work orders, facility, and asset management.
related_products.features: UpKeep's Work Order Management Software is a modern maintenance and asset management solution for your team. From your desktop to your phone and even your tablet, UpKeep is easily accessible from anywhere at any time. Create work orders on-the-go, get notifications when tasks are updated, and receive alerts straight from your app when assets go down making your business run more efficiently than ever before.

related_products.short_desc: Work Order Software for managing assets, inventory,  maintenance and work orders. Quick adoption with free trial.
related_products.features: Our leading Work Order Software help you track maintenance costs, schedule one-off and recurring services, manage service vendors, and customize maintenance alerts for greater control. Use our mobile app to scan QR Code and Barcode labels and manage service tickets on the go. Work order management, asset tracking, and in-depth service reports make this the ideal maintenance management software - both for corrective and preventive maintenance. RFID and Zendesk integration. Try It For Free!

related_products.short_desc: Win more jobs, get paid faster, and impress your customers with mHelpDesk, the #1 all-in-one work order solution for your business.
related_products.features: Time to get organized! Work order management solutions from mHelpDesk will help you win more jobs, organize your business, and impress your customers. From the office to the field, we help you manage your work orders with one easy-to-use and affordable software solution. Manage your work orders end-to-end with scheduling, dispatch, billing, inventory management, getting paid, and everything in between. Our in-house product experts will get you up-and-running today.

related_products.short_desc: Customize jobs to match worker order needs. Collect site details, photos and customer signatures from your workers' mobile devices.
related_products.features: Verizon Connect Work helps you manage your business more efficiently. Jobs can be customized to match the needs of each work order and added, updated, reassigned, and synced with your back-office. Collect relevant information in the field such as site details, photos, and customer signatures while empowering your technicians with software that's compatible with their smartphones and tablets.Take control of your schedules, invoices, and quotes by moving them to the cloud.

related_products.short_desc: Home service businesses can automate & market with Jobber field management software. Track business & take payments! Try it free!
related_products.features: Try Jobber now for free! You'll get 5-Star service & advanced automation from our easy-to-install field management software. Jobber work order software allows your customers to book through Facebook, automates reminders, & puts quotes, scheduling, and invoicing all in one place! Plus, with instant in-person payments & 24-hour online payment, transactions are a snap! Deliver an amazing customer experience with Jobber.

related_products.short_desc: Fiix's work order management software helps you plan, track, measure, and optimize maintenance to boost efficiency and asset health.
related_products.features: Fiix's work order management software is the easiest way to plan, track, and optimize maintenance. Fiix partners with you to organize assets and inventory, manage work, connect to business systems, and make data-driven decisions. Use customizable dashboards to see all your work, parts, costs, schedules, and KPIs in one place with just a few clicks. Our technician-focused desktop and mobile apps help you create, schedule, prioritize, and be notified of tasks from anywhere-even when offline.

related_products.short_desc:

With FieldEdge Flat Rate Mobile (formerly Coolfront Mobile), techs can easily answer a homeowner's #1 question of "how much is this going to cost?" Our extensive flat rate database has over 30,000 repairs and 16,000 parts. We offer the leading zero-cost flat rate pricing and work order management app with QuickBooks integration.

Boost your team's efficiency with cutting-edge features our customers love, like our Boards tool, automation options, and mobile app.

related_products.short_desc: The eSPACE Work Order Management module is the most comprehensive facility management software on the market!
related_products.features:
eSPACE has best-in-class customer service and ongoing development support, Our Work Order Management module is the most comprehensive facility management software on the market! Some of our key features includes:

- Work Orders and Assignments & Inventory Control
- Robust Reporting Options & Equipment Tracking
- Preventive Maintenance
- Vendor Portal

Take us on a free test drive for 30 days or request a free demo today!

related_products.short_desc: FMX's work order software streamlines processes, increases asset productivity, and turns actionable insights into meaningful results.
related_products.features: Make your work order process easy and reliable by equipping technicians with everything they need in the field. FMX is the most reviewed, highest-rated work order software on the market. Access work orders from a mobile device and view these tasks on a calendar. When submitting a work order, add photos and auto-assign the task to a technician. Scan QR codes to retrieve work history and equipment manuals. Track your team and equipment performance with configurable reports and dashboards.

MaintainX is the world-leading mobile-first workflow management platform for industrial and frontline workers. We are a modern IoT-enabled cloud-based tool for maintenance, safety, and operations on equipment and facilities.

MaintainX helps businesses track reactive and preventive maintenance, and control the daily operations, such as safety inspections, quality inspections, and operating checklists-all with a digital audit trail

similar_products.short_desc: VSight Workflow allows technicians to have self-guidance with interactive, step-by-step instructions, enhancing operational accuracy.

You can easily create, deploy and execute dynamic workflows; capture work data and start building a digital knowledge network for training, reporting, and inspecting.

similar_products.short_desc: Take your company mobile, manage tasks, sales, quoting, work orders, maintenance, recurring contracts, timesheets, invoicing and more!

Create quotes, work orders, scheduling, invoicing, payments, inventory, ongoing maintenance, recurring work, timesheets and much more.  Customer that utilize ServiceBox see significant improvements to their overall workflow and reduce time to process paper by 96%.  This leads to your bottom line and significant growth.

similar_products.short_desc: TheWorxHub is a cloud-based maintenance management solution designed for both healthcare and senior living.

With TheWorxHub, you can more efficiently manage your operations, including work orders, asset tracking, compliance tasks, preventive maintenance, inventory and housekeeping. similar_products.short_desc: Vonigo works great for service companies looking to streamline operations and increase sales.

similar_products.short_desc: Work order solution organizes service requests, schedules recurring tasks, tracks assets, time and materials, provides reporting.

Upgrades & tech support are included. Be up and running in a day! Find out why we are consistently the highest rated! Request a Free Demo Now!

similar_products.short_desc: Asset Essentials is a cloud-based CMMS platform developed to reduce maintenance costs, improve productivity and make smarter decisions
similar_products.features: Asset Essentials is an industry-leading CMMS platform for smarter, more efficient asset and operations management. 12,000+ operations leaders rely on Asset Essentials to track maintenance work -- leveraging the solution's deep reporting, asset health forecasting and mobile and GIS capabilities. From work order management to preventative maintenance to asset tracking, this user-friendly platform empowers organizations to cut costs, improve productivity, and extend asset lifecycle.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based tools to share critical information, facilitate requests, automate processes, resolve concerns, and manage home records.

SiteOne's solutions allow builders to share critical information with homeowners, facilitate requests, automate processes, resolve concerns, and manage home records.

similar_products.short_desc: Coast is mobile-first and one of the highest-rated work order tools today. Built for teams of all sizes and industries.
similar_products.features: Coast is mobile-first and one of the highest-rated work order tools today. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Building Maintenance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Building Maintenance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Building Maintenance software manages business operations for service providers catering to the general upkeep of facilities. These applications help manage appointment scheduling, service call details, dispatch and communication tools for technicians in the field. They offer such features as customer / location service histories, wireless communications integration, job location mapping tools and also integrate traditional business functions such as accounting, contract management, invoicing and customer relationship management into one convenient tool. Building Maintenance software is related to Facility Management software, Maintenance Management software, Mobile software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Equipment Maintenance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Equipment Maintenance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Equipment Maintenance software automates the process of managing equipment history and maintenance records. These applications help manage inbound service calls, schedule appointments, and provide dispatch and communication tools for technicians in the field. They also offer features like customer / location service histories, wireless communications integration, job location mapping tools and they integrate traditional business functions such as accounting, contract management, invoicing and customer relationship management into one convenient tool. Equipment Maintenance software is related to Building Maintenance software, Facility Management software, Field Service Management software, Mobile software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Field Service Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Field Service Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Field Service Management software enables organizations to manage resources and communicate with field employees. Field Service Management systems enhance productivity by allowing constant contact between dispatch office and offsite personnel. They improve the customer experience by giving field personnel access to service histories, mapping services, scheduling tools and to the organization's knowledge base resources. Field Service Management software is related to Maintenance Management software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fleet Maintenance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fleet Maintenance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fleet Maintenance software concentrates on repairs and the preventive maintenance aspect of managing business vehicles. Maintenance schedules, work orders, vehicle lifespan tracking, parts management, service records, etc. are typical functions for this type of software. Fleet Maintenance functionality would often be included as part of a more comprehensive Fleet Management package. For related solutions see also Aviation Maintenance, Equipment Maintenance, Maintenance Management, and Trucking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Maintenance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Maintenance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Maintenance Management software automates the tracking and scheduling of maintenance activities, enabling service organizations to operate proactively while reducing downtime and increasing operating efficiency. Maintenance Management applications can automate routine tasks while keeping track of scheduled maintenance service calls and converting completed work assignments directly into invoices ready to be processed. Maintenance Management software is related to Field Service Management software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Service Dispatch software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Service Dispatch tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Service Dispatch software assists with the scheduling and dispatching of field personnel. Service Dispatch applications enhance efficiency and productivity by allowing constant contact between dispatch office and offsite personnel. Service Dispatch solutions also provide field personnel with access to service histories, contracts, mapping services, job management and scheduling tools, expediting work orders and reducing downtime. Service Dispatch software is related to Field Service Management software and Maintenance Management software.

_source.short_desc: Straightforward asset, maintenance & work order management software. Great software doesn't take hours of training & set-up.
_source.long_desc:
Straightforward maintenance management with features such as asset tracking, inventory, reporting and beautiful, industry-leading native mobile apps.
The leading disruptor in the maintenance management software industry, Maintainly (formerly Fixd.io) is the software to turn to when old, legacy software just can't go with you into the future.
_source.pricing_details:
Maintainly offers a free plan with limited features, after which pricing scales depending on business size, as follows (all prices in USD):

Free: includes mobile app, materials database, and flexible asset hierarchies. 
Small Business: $12/user/month for all free features plus timesheet integration, email and push notifications, stocktaking, and inventory management.
Enterprise: $24/user/month for all the Small Business plan features plus multi-business and multi-site management, bulk work order creation, API access, and a dedicated account manager.

Additional features: 
Inventory management: $6/user/month
Timesheets management: $4/user/month
Payroll tracking: $2/user/month

Special pricing is available for developing markets & the Maintainly Social Impact Fund is open to all not-for-profit entities, or for-profit companies making a social impact that aligns with Maintainly's core values.
_source.target_audience: Industries with assets under management & work orders. This includes energy, healthcare (eg. hospitals), farming / agriculture, manufacturing, hotel, vacation rental, gym & church.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top EAM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of EAM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Enterprise Asset Management (EAM) software helps you view, control, and manage your organization's physical assets across departments and locations. Users can use EAM software to track equipment usage, manage maintenance schedules, and optimize the life of your assets. By proactively managing your equipment with EAM software, you'll be better prepared for equipment failure and may reduce your operating costs. Buyers looking for EAM software may also be interested in Asset Tracking software, Fixed Asset Management software, IT Asset Management software, and Budgeting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fixed Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fixed Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fixed Asset Management software is designed to track the MRO lifecycle and maintain depreciation values on assets such as land, buildings, motor vehicles, furniture, office equipment, computers, and other items, which cannot easily be turned into cash. This type of software can help any size company convert from spreadsheet record-keeping to streamlined reporting of fixed asset depreciation and is a good fit for companies that need to be valued for tax or acquisition purposes. Fixed Asset Management software is related to Accounting software, IT Asset Management software, Inventory Control software, and Inventory Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Asset Management software provides enterprise wide inventory and life cycle management of software and hardware assets. This can include asset maintenance history, user permissions, acquisition budget forecasting, and software license compliance. This type of software enables IT managers to improve cost control and accurately track IT's business value throughout the organization. IT Asset Management software is related to Compliance software, License Management software, and IT Management software.
